events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request qualifies as a refund case due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning case to refund specialist team to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed?
Here is the photo of the product I received and my order number is 987654321. Please process the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
Thanks, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to getting the refund soon.
Your refund request has been approved and is now being processed. You will receive the money back shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully and if you need any further help.
I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for the smooth process and excellent support.
Closing this case now as the refund was received and the customer has no further concerns.
